mapper.insert: insert into t_rent_pay (master_id, hotel_id, company_id, total_pay, fact_pay_time_start, fact_pay_time_end, facted_pay_time_end, facted_pay_time_start, fact_pay, pay_count, pay_time, pay_type, spare_money, pay_fact_time, pay_period_start, pay_period_end, is_cash, description,is_active, house_name, first_pay, first_pay_time, sum_pay, day_pay, month_pay,area,house_count,shuidian,kongtiao,gongnuan,wuye) values (#{masterId}, #{hotelId}, #{companyId}, #{totalPay}, #{factPayTimeStart}, #{factPayTimeEnd}, #{factedPayTimeEnd}, #{factedPayTimeStart}, #{factPay}, #{payCount}, #{payTime}, #{payType}, #{spareMoney}, #{payFactTime}, #{payPeriodStart}, #{payPeriodEnd}, #{isCash}, #{description}, #{isActive}, #{houseName}, #{firstPay}, #{firstPayTime}, #{sumPay}, #{dayPay}, #{monthPay},#{area},#{houseCount},#{shuidian},#{kongtiao},#{gongnuan},#{wuye})
mapper.update: update t_rent_pay set is_active=#{status} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select (select IfNULL(count(house_name),0) from t_rent_pay where year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'houseTotal', (select IfNULL(sum(spare_money),0) from t_rent_pay where is_cash=0 and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'dfPayMoney', (select IfNULL(sum(month_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now()) and NOW()>facted_pay_time_start) as 'chaoqiPayMoney', (select IfNULL(sum(month_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'monthPayMoney', (select IfNULL(avg(month_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'houseMonthPayMoney', (select IfNULL(avg(day_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'houseDayPayMoney', (select IfNULL(sum(first_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where is_cash=0 and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now()) and facted_pay_time_end BETWEEN NOW() and date_add(now(), interval 5 day)) as 'fiveDayPayMoney', (select IfNULL(avg(datediff(facted_pay_time_end,facted_pay_time_start))*sum(day_pay),0) from t_rent_pay where is_cash=0 and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now()) and month(now())=month(facted_pay_time_end)) as 'thisMonthPayMoney', (select IfNULL(sum(pay_money),0.0) from t_house_fact_pay t,t_rent_pay r where t.house_rent_id=r.id and t.house_rent_id=r.id and year(r.facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'thisMonthPayAll', (select IfNULL(sum(month_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now()) and month(date_add(NOW(), interval 1 month))=month(facted_pay_time_end)) as 'nextMonthPay' from t_rent_pay limit 0,1;

select (select IfNULL(count(house_name),0) from t_rent_pay where hotel_id=#{hotelId} and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'houseTotal', (select IfNULL(sum(spare_money),0) from t_rent_pay where hotel_id=#{hotelId} and is_cash=0 and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'dfPayMoney', (select IfNULL(sum(month_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where hotel_id=#{hotelId} and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now()) and NOW()>facted_pay_time_start) as 'chaoqiPayMoney', (select IfNULL(sum(month_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where hotel_id=#{hotelId} and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'monthPayMoney', (select IfNULL(avg(month_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where hotel_id=#{hotelId} and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'houseMonthPayMoney', (select IfNULL(avg(day_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where hotel_id=#{hotelId} and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'houseDayPayMoney', (select IfNULL(sum(first_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where hotel_id=#{hotelId} and is_cash=0 and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now()) and facted_pay_time_end BETWEEN NOW() and date_add(now(), interval 5 day)) as 'fiveDayPayMoney', (select IfNULL(avg(datediff(facted_pay_time_end,facted_pay_time_start))*sum(day_pay),0) from t_rent_pay where hotel_id=#{hotelId} and is_cash=0 and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now()) and month(now())=month(facted_pay_time_end)) as 'thisMonthPayMoney', (select IfNULL(sum(pay_money),0.0) from t_house_fact_pay t,t_rent_pay r where r.hotel_id=#{hotelId} and t.house_rent_id=r.id and t.house_rent_id=r.id and year(r.facted_pay_time_end)=year(now())) as 'thisMonthPayAll', (select IfNULL(sum(month_pay),0.0) from t_rent_pay where hotel_id=#{hotelId} and year(facted_pay_time_end)=year(now()) and month(date_add(NOW(), interval 1 month))=month(facted_pay_time_end)) as 'nextMonthPay' from t_rent_pay where hotel_id=#{hotelId} GROUP BY hotel_id;
mapper.update: update t_rent_pay set facted_pay_time_start = date_add(facted_pay_time_start, interval pay_type MONTH ), facted_pay_time_end = date_add(facted_pay_time_end, interval pay_type MONTH ), spare_money = spare_money-first_pay, sum_pay=sum_pay+1 where id=#{id}
